digest_items.title: Remove default credentials
digest_items.why: Default passwords are publicly known and exploited by automated scanners
digest_items.fix: Change all default passwords immediately after deployment

digest_items.title: Use TLS 1.3 exclusively
digest_items.why: Older TLS versions have known vulnerabilities and weaker cipher suites
digest_items.fix: Update server config to disable TLS 1.0, 1.1, 1.2 and enable only TLS 1.3

digest_items.title: Verify API versioning strategy
digest_items.why: Deprecated API versions may have unpatched vulnerabilities
digest_items.fix: Maintain clear deprecation timeline and force upgrades for old versions

digest_items.title: Disable directory listing
digest_items.why: Directory listing exposes file structure and sensitive files
digest_items.fix: Set 'Options -Indexes' in Apache or 'autoindex off' in nginx

digest_items.title: Rotate API keys quarterly
digest_items.why: Regular rotation limits the window of exposure if keys are compromised
digest_items.fix: Set calendar reminders and use secret management tools like HashiCorp Vault
